caption: Solid food. Friendly staff. 1 star short because I am comparing it to the nicest restaurants I've been to (Ruth's Chris/21 Main). The atmosphere is a bit off and the menu is small. But overall the Filet was amazing.
Highly recommend.

this was our first time here and it was amazing. best customer service in the city. shout out to Nicki, Issala, and Ernie..... they were all so friendly and welcoming. we had a drink we weren't so keen on and they took it back like it was …

It was our first time visiting Caruso Confections. Great atmospher, amazing food and such amazing staff! Ernie came welcomed our family and treated us just like his family. The whole staff was friendly. We will definitely be coming back!

The lady behind the bar was the only up side. She was busy but still gave great service. I ordered tiramisu, which should be virtually impossible to receive dried out, because there’s espresso poured over it, right? I guess they missed the …
Great food, the owners are friendly and very welcoming
Best Italian In town, and possibly the best deserts I’ve ever had. Great service and friendly mom and pop owners!

Great food I had the chicken risotto, it was to die for and a slice of cake, I don't remember the name of the but it was white with berries and cheese. Sorry I didn't take a picture, I prefer to live in moment. I will be visiting again!!!!!

Lobster ravioli is ridiculous! ***update*** Yet another great dining experience! Chef William is on point! Great service from Bethany, our server and a delicious new offering from the kitchen. Keep up the good work!***  Great first …

Super cute atmosphere, phenomenal desserts! Great place to pick up a sweet treat. High-end artisan desserts - do prepare to spend accordingly $$$, but it's worth it! Their selections for cakes by the slice is always different - mix of basic …
The best Italian in fayetteville. Deserts are the best

Love their food, it is phenomenal! The focaccia bread , lobster ravioli, and chicken caprese are out of this world. We loved our server lily she was so attentive & friendly. We will definitely be back.
Very nice love the food every thing was delicious 😋 loved the people

One of my favorite Italian restaurants to go to now, especially since they have some amazing desserts! The owner and staff are very friendly and the food never disappoints. On a mission to try everything! But can’t help going to some favorites! They also make delicious cocktail drinks and have specials for holidays!
First time there Saturday night  great atmosphere , staff was friendly and most important food was amazing !!! Will definitely frequent them !
Chef William on point as usual! Really great service and the pastries are ridiculous! Can’t wait to return! Thanks Ernie n Lisa!
Great little dessert and bar place.     Always friendly staff.    Very clean and very nice inside seating area.  Outside seating is available.   Very fresh desserts at the ready

Seriously some of if not the best Italian food that my husband and I have tried. We went for the delicious looking desserts but were pleasantly surprised at how delicious everything else was. We started with the bruschetta and then had the …
Really great place! Awesome food, great service really good employees. Also had a chance to meet the owners really great people. I highly recommend it if you’re ever in town.

***Update*** our server tonight was Bethany. Very attentive and pleasant. Caruso’s continues to impress. Thanks again!***  Filet is delicious! Actually, everything I’ve ever had here is delicious! Thanks to Ernie and crew, job well done 👍
Friendly staff and environment. Great lunch
Kind, helpful staff. Delicious desert. Cozy dining.

This was the best dinner we have had in a long time in Fayetteville! Definitely recommend stopping by here if you haven’t! They have dinner entrees, drinks, and desserts. Service was AWESOME! Everyone was so nice and helpful. We will definitely be coming back!

I have been absolutely blown away every time that I've been to Caruso. Their food for lunch, dinner, and dessert is amazing. The service is even better. The owners consistently interact and talk with the guests to enhance the dining …
The best food in Fayetteville! Great service and an amazing chef!

First time visiting this place, and after our experience there, we were so sad we hadn't found them sooner! Beautiful atmosphere - quiet and charming. Incredibly hospitable staff and the owner stopped and talked with every patron. So many …
Great people with a wonderful atmosphere and awesome food

Went in there originally to try their confections and I had purchasrd a oreo, and red velvet dessert. Though both of the cakes were tough to swallow, being they were loaded with so much sugar and they seemed old, but also they had no flavor …
Great meal
Great dinner food and deserts. Best Italian place in town
Best Italian food in Fayetteville. Amazing deserts.
The staff, food, drinks, and atmosphere are amazing here. A hidden gem in Fayetteville—a must try!!!

The name is misleading. This place is likely the best Italian dinner food I’ve had since my honeymoon in Italy. The risotto is incredible here and the caprese is fresh and flavorful. The custom drinks are amazing and the chocolate martini …

Absolutely delicious food, and such nice people. The food is absolutely delicious, the meals are wonderful authentic Northern Italian. Many restaurants can serve "Italian food" but very few have been able to make me feel like I was walking …
Everything is delicious and unique I loved it
Fantastic fresh food in a great atmosphere.
The Best in Town. Complimenting to the Chef. Amazing food and Tasty. Thank you.

We have been here twice. The first time we got there peppercorn sauce with  steak and seared tuna steak , absolutely delicious. Tonight we got there pizza and it is the best pizza in town. This is the BEST Authentic Italian food in town. Compliments to the chef
Fantastic food and desserts!!!  The owners are super friendly and will definitely be giving them more business moving forward.  Italian dishes are phenomenal!!!

New Flash!  Caruso has THE BEST Italian dinner menu in downtown Fayetteville.  Creamy sauces, awesome pasta, delicious risotto, scrumptious steak and chicken.  So if that is not enough I love their soups and desserts and they have wine beer and spirits.  A true one-stop shop of what I enjoy!
Best food I’ve had in a while hands down‼️‼️
The fried chicken sandwich is the best!
Absolutely wonderful! The pastries are the best in town. The menu has something for everyone and are presented elegantly.  Delicious!

Cozy atmosphere with some delicious deserts! The coffee was really good. Huge selection of beers on tap and liquor to enjoy your night. Free WiFi also so you can sit enjoy a drink and get some work done. Definitely recommend this place to anyone who is looking for a good place to go.
Really good food!
Just delightful.
The staff was so friendly, she gave us ideas for a photoshoot in December, the desert was so yummy and the atmosphere was delightful.
Staff and food are both wonderful!
Love love LOVE their food and their sweets! The muffaletta is my favorite. It's done so well. And the tomato bisque is so flavorful!

username: Archbishop Dr. Abrams Almasi, MDiv, DD, PhD

caption: Damn good Soup! This was my first time here. I got the soup of the day with 1/2 a muffaletta. Delicious! Mine was Cream of Mushroom. Yum. Will be back!
Great lunch. Soups were awesome! Pastries and dessert....wow!

One of Fayetteville's hidden jems.  Not your average "sweet house", but a true confectionery with bespoke chocolates, cookies, cakes, and pastries.  Balancing the sweeter side is Caruso's selection of coffee, micro brews, and one if the best menus in town of expertly crafted sandwiches and quiche.
Delicious,  Beautiful presentation as well.
Awesome local gem in downtown Fayetteville.
Amazing place! Fancy and cute! Chocolate was great. The manager was very attentive and knowledgeable. I cannot wait to go back and try the actual food!
This place is phenomenal. The food is great and fresh and the owner clearly cares about his business. They are kind and go out of their way to take care of you. Need more places like this downtown!!

DELICIOUS!!!  Can't wait to return!!!  Savory ham and asparagus quiche best ever, served with fruit and small chocolate filled croissant, carried out their lemon berry cake for later and it was AMAZING!!!

Another hidden gem in downtown Fayetteville. We popped into Caruso Confections to satisfy our sweet tooth and it did not disappoint. We shared the Summer Berry Cake and the Snickers Pie. Both were a treat not only for the taste, but were …

What an AMAZING experience. My husband and I walked in at 9:05pm at the end of a downtown date night (this establishment closes at 9:00pm)...we didn’t realize and we are not those type of people as we both work in retail...and they refused …
Flavorful and foodie spot!!

I LOVE this place!! Great atmosphere. The cookies are amazing and the coffee is perfect. They just started serving lunch, and the cashew chicken sandwich is very tasty. The cocktails are great. Best of all the staff is so friendly and the customer service is exceptional. You can't go wrong here. 5 stars all around! 💛

EXTREMELY EXPENSIVE for the size of confections sold, but the flavors are inventive. I spent $27 on two very thin pieces of cake and a very small truffle that wasn't very favorful. It is a very nice place, but please be aware that it is not a place you go get the most for your dollar. My kid enjoyed the cake, but it was very dry.
It’s was amazing food all of it was delicious. I would recommend for all.

Caruso confections are wonderful. I fear they will not be open very long because it's over priced for Downtown Fayetteville... they would do better lowering the price a couple of dollars and selling more. This is a small town you have to stretch your $. We just dream big. Good Luck.

You can see where Fayetteville is heading when you stop here. This shop has a modern, elegant atmosphere. The desserts range from sophisticated to your traditional treats. The specialty drinks are very flavorful and unique! They also offer wine and beer. But those deserts...SO good. Definitely a must visit when in Fayetteville.
My mouth dropped! This place is so awesome! The goods are to die for and the staff was very kind and polite! This is my new spot!!!! Oh yeah they have grown up drinks.......

Visited this newer shop a couple weeks ago after dinner at Circo 1800. Very impressed with this tidy, cozy, quaint, little sweets and coffee shop. Cappuccino was just right. Sweets were scrumptious. Staff was friendly and attentive. Great addition to the downtown area. Looking forward to visiting again soon.
I ordered about four different pastries every single one of them was delicious

What a fantastic addition to down town Fayetteville. A fun little family outing or date spot. We stopped after dinner and had a beverage, chocolates, and got a brownie/chocolate croissant to go. All items were delicious - quality ingredients!

One of the BEST places in downtown Fayetteville! Desserts are incredible and you can grab a drink while you’re there. It’s an intimate experience or just a pop in grab some goodies and go experience. Best of both worlds! If you go, and you don’t know what to get, get the chocolates. They are heavenly!
Came down to visit family and check out downtown fayetteville. Macarons were not good and dry.   Chocolate was ok but be prepare to spend a lot
Great atmosphere, friendly and attentive staff, delicious candies and pastries. Just need to work on the cappuccino and this Iloilo be a five star location in downtown Fayetteville.
Excellent desserts and hot chocolate.  The atmosphere was comfortable and above all, the bathrooms are clean. Thank you for a delightful post lunch dessert!
Little pricey for dessert, but it was really good. I could spend a loooooot in here unsupervised.

Strolled in here on my lunch break today. The atmosphere was inviting, yet upscale and beautiful. The staff was very friendly and informative about all of their tasty options. A little slice of paradise in downtown. Will definitely be indulging again!
Fantastic atmosphere, desserts and staff!

My book club and I meet here and we are very impressed with this new dessert shop! The owner and associates are very nice! They make you feel at home and are always very welcoming! They even gave us free dark chocolate! Which was phenomenal.
Very nice atmosphere and great treats!

Very pleasant service, each of the staff I encountered were friendly and helpful. I purchased a variety of pastries and desserts in lieu of a birthday cake, all of which were wonderful and throughly enjoyed by myself and my guests. Location is perfect for an after dinner treat or a before dinner drink.

Walked in on Saturday and they were all so nice! Place was clean and the desserts were amazing. They made us hot chocolate from scratch. They used real melted chocolate. Will definitely be going back.

Well shoot. I am impressed. Its about time we got an After Date Night spot in Downtown Fayetteville. Its not just a dessert spot...you can get a French Connection or an Old Fashioned to sip with your treat. Try the Kouin Aman (its like a …
